metadata.synopsis: After fighting with the paladins, avatar Karlach will get a small dialog in which she will go into a rage.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Defeat the paladins with Karlach participating in the fight as avatar and finishing it with her near the tollhouse or inside or use the origins debug book (Karlach -> Paladins of Tyr -> Test enrage).

7.speaker: Karlach
7.text: I'm gonna destroy this place. Rip it apart, board by board.
7.context: InternalNodeContext: Karlach talking to herself silently, this is internal dialogue (no finger-to-temple)

2.speaker: Karlach
2.text: Easy, girl. There's no point now - you already killed them all.

6.speaker: Karlach
6.text: But wouldn't it do to send a message? Wouldn't it be oh-so-fucking fantastic to leave nothing behind at all?!
6.context: InternalNodeContext: Karlach talking to herself silently, this is internal dialogue (no finger-to-temple)

1.speaker: Karlach
1.text: I hope you're watching, Zariel. I hope you see how free I am. And I hope you know I'm never, EVER, EVER GOING BACK!
1.context: CinematicNodeContext: FIRES BURNING AT MAXInternalNodeContext: Karlach talking to herself silently, this is internal dialogue (no finger-to-temple)

5.speaker: Karlach
5.text: I'm hot. Really hot. Is this safe?

8.speaker: Karlach
8.text: Probably not. Nothing's safe - never will be. But I can feel the fire in every vein, and I'm not gonna let it go to waste.
